room_title: Escape room "Mansion Murder" by Escapology Garwood in New York
review: This is a very great place for family night , in fact its addictive . This is thus far the best escaperoom. It was a very fun mind activity for the family. I will be back to try the other rooms definitely.

room_title: Escape room "Mansion Murder" by Escapology Garwood in New York
review: Did the Murder Mystery room. We didn't kill it, but had a great time. Michael was a great help with hints!

room_title: Escape room "Mansion Murder" by Escapology Garwood in New York
review: This place is really great. At this point I've done about 50 escape rooms across the country. The rooms here are well themed. They are also very lock/puzzle intensive, but at times one thing would hold up all the players because one puzzle was needed to continue the game, which makes time super valuable. We've done anecdote and Mansion Murder,  and we were able to escape both. We are very excited to try the rest! Definitely recommend if you're in the area.
